title: Synchronous REST API with Lambda SnapStart
description: This pattern demonstrates how to create a synchronous REST API using API Gateway, AWS Lambda and RDS.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern is built using [Micronaut 3](https://micronaut.io) and uses [Lambda SnapStart](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/compute/reducing-java-cold-starts-on-aws-lambda-functions-with-snapstart/) to improve startup performance.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Mark Sailes
authors.bio: Mark is a specialist solutions architect working at AWS. His primary focus is improving the developer experience of builders using Java on AWS Lambda.
